summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNED A 2019 CRUISER FUN FINDER EXTREME LITE RV BEING TOWED BY A 2005 RAM 1500. WHILE DRIVING 60 MPH, ANOTHER VEHICLE VEERED INTO THE CONTACT'S LANE AND CAUSED THE CONTACT TO SLAM ON THE BRAKE PEDAL. WITHOUT WARNING, THE REAR AXLE FRACTURED. THE RV WAS TOWED BY THE INSURANCE COMPANY TO A TWO LOT AND WAS DEEMED A TOTAL LOSS. CAMPING WORLD OF TALLAHASSEE (31300 BLUE STAR HIGHWAY, HWY US 90, MIDWAY, FL 32343, (888) 722-2581) WAS UNABLE TO DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE. THE RV WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. *DT*DT*TR
